In recognition of my fourth year in business full time selling books, and i=
n
gratitude to the support that all of my friends in the collecting
communi=
ties have given, I am announcing an 20% off sale through midnight
7/7/07 - =
eight full days. (It's just past midnight on the East coast, but of
course =
it's already Friday afternoon in Australia and Japan, Friday morning
in Eur=
ope, so to keep it fair let's say the sale ends midnight 7/7/07
wherever yo=
u are.) Please do feel free to pass this message on to interested
collector=
s who may not be on the several email lists (and excuse the
cross-posting.)=


No minimum purchase - or maximum. This is your chance to get a great deal=
 on
Soshu Den Meisaku Shu, Tanobe's Meihin Katanaezu Shusei, the complete 6=

volume Kanzan Token Koza, complete 10 volume Haynes Auction Catalogs,
Fuku=
shi's Goto and Machibori books, or the Kokuh=F4 T=F4ken Zufu.

All shipping=
 will be done at cost as I always have. Postage rates,
especially for overs=
eas shipments have changed drastically since May 14th,
but I will work with=
 you to get your order to you safely and quickly with
the least expense pos=
sible.

Regrettably, if you live in Illinois, I have to charge 8.75% sales =
tax.

As always, what is listed on my website is not all of what I have on =
hand,
though I will make every effort to keep updating. If there's somethin=
g
you've been looking for, please do ask as I very likely may have it.

Pay=
ment by PayPal, or direct credit card charge to your Visa, MasterCard,
Amer=
ican Express, or Discover Card, and I will accept wire transfers to
accommo=
date overseas customers.

Finally, I am aware that the hosting service I us=
e has an expired security
certificate, so if you want to use a credit card =
you can call me, fax me, or
split the information into two or more email me=
ssages. Also, there's a bug
in the PayPal ordering button - yes, I'm moving=
 to a new hosting service and
working with a new web person to fix these th=
ings. It's probably best to
email me directly in any case as the shipping f=
or each order will be
different.

Thanks in advance for your continued supp=
ort!

Craig
